thread.title: Loyola-Chicago Beats Kansas State to Advance to the Final Four - WSJ

author: sports.yahoo.com
title: Loyola-Chicago Beats Kansas State to Advance to the Final Four - WSJ

organizations.name: wsj sports college basketball loyola-chicago beats kansas state

text:
Sports College Basketball Loyola-Chicago Beats Kansas State to Advance to the Final Four The No. 11 seed Ramblers, the high-spirited and heartwarming story of this NCAA tournament, will face Michigan in a national semifinal game By Andrew Beaton Andrew Beaton The Wall Street Journal Biography Andrew Beaton @andrewlbeaton andrew.beaton@wsj.com March 24, 2018 8:37 p.m. ET ATLANTAâ€”Holy Sister. Loyola-Chicago is headed to the Final Four.
No. 11 seed Loyola Chicago, the high-spirited and heartwarming story of this NCAA tournament, claimed its place in history with a 78-62 win over No. 9 seed Kansas State here in the Elite Eight, setting up a meeting with No. 3 seed Michigan for a spot in the championship.
